narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This was a prelicense inspection of the traveling site, animals, and veterinary care plan only. The applicant will be
ready for licensure after successful completion of a prelicense inspection at site 001. This inspection was conducted
at the PA Renaissance Faire in Manheim, PA.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more prelicense inspections within 90 days of today or the applicant will
forfeit the application fee and must wait for 6 months to reapply.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
